ModuleTitle: Integrated Biostatistics and Bioinformatics Journal Club
ModuleDescription: This module covers the following: - Uses published articles to highlight quantitative and medical science issues that are common to biostatistics and bioinformatics - Appreciates and critiques the use and misuse of quantitative methods in medical research - Identifies and reviews techniques and resources that biostatisticians and bioinformaticians need - Identifies potential areas for futher research
